properties.description: The available color engines.
properties.name: engineList

properties.description: A list of valid color management system settings configurations.
properties.name: cmsSettingsList

properties.description: A list of valid CMYK color profiles.
properties.name: workingSpaceCMYKList

properties.description: A list of valid RGB color profiles.
properties.name: workingSpaceRGBList

properties.description: Returns true if the object specifier resolves to valid objects.
properties.name: isValid

properties.description: The parent of the ColorSetting (a Application).
properties.name: parent

properties.description: A collection of events.
properties.name: events

properties.description: A collection of event listeners.
properties.name: eventListeners

properties.description: The policy for handling colors in a CMYK color model, including reading and embedding color profiles, resolving mismatches between embedded color profiles and the working space, and moving colors between documents.
properties.name: cmykPolicy

properties.description: If true, enables color management.
properties.name: enableColorManagement

properties.description: The color management module (CMM) for mapping color space gamuts between documents.
properties.name: engine

properties.description: If true, displays a prompt when opening a file whose embedded color profile does not match the current working space. The prompt provides the option to override the default mismatch behavior.
properties.name: mismatchAskWhenOpening

properties.description: If true, displays a prompt when importing an object (via pasting, drag-and-drop, or other similar methods) whose colors do not match the current working space. The prompt provides the option to override the default mismatch behavior.
properties.name: mismatchAskWhenPasting

properties.description: If true, displays a prompt when opening a file that does not have an embedded color profile. The prompt provides the option to assign a color profile.
properties.name: missingAskWhenOpening

properties.description: The policy for handling colors in an RGB color model, including reading and embedding color profiles, handling mismatches between embedded color profiles and the working space, and moving colors from one document to another.
properties.name: rgbPolicy

properties.description: The current color management system settings configuration. Note: For information on possible values, see CMS settings list.
properties.name: cmsSettings

properties.description: The file path of the CSF file to use.
properties.name: cmsSettingsPath

properties.description: If true, uses black point compensation to ensure that shadow detail is preserved by simulating the full dynamic range of the output device.
properties.name: useBPC

properties.description: The current CMYK profile.
properties.name: workingSpaceCMYK

properties.description: The current RGB profile.
properties.name: workingSpaceRGB

properties.description: The default rendering intent.
properties.name: intent

properties.description: If true, uses LAB alternates for spot colors when available.
properties.name: accurateLABSpots

properties.description: If true, uses idealized black for CMYK-to-RGB or CMYK-to-Gray conversions to the screen.
properties.name: idealizedBlackToScreen

properties.description: If true, uses idealized black for CMYK-to-RGB or CMYK-to-Gray conversions to print or export.
properties.name: idealizedBlackToExport

properties.description: A property that allows setting of several properties at the same time.
properties.name: properties

methods.description: Generates a string which, if executed, will return the ColorSetting.
methods.name: toSource

methods.description: Resolves the object specifier, creating an array of object references.
methods.name: getElements

parameters.description: The event handler. Can accept: File or JavaScript Function.
parameters.name: handler

parameters.description: The registered event handler. Can accept: File or JavaScript Function.
parameters.name: handler
